text: Rolf Fredrik Skoglund (11 August 1940 – 28 June 2022) was a Swedish actor. He won the Eugene O'Neill Award in 2007. He was known for his roles in Vi hade i alla fall tur med vädret, Fångarna på fortet and Jönssonligan spelar högt. Skoglund was born in Stockholm, Sweden. His career began in 1963 and he retired in 2021. Skoglund died on 28 Junee 2022 at his home in Stockholm from non-Hodgkin lymphoma at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from non-Hodgkin lymphoma Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Rolf Skoglund
